marketplaces.name: 0xrdan-plugins
marketplaces.description: Claude Code plugins by Dan Monteiro
marketplaces.repo_description: A curated collection of Claude Code plugins by Dan Monteiro. If you like what I'm doing, please feel free to share!

plugins.name: claude-router
plugins.description: Intelligent model routing for Claude Code - routes queries to optimal Claude model (Haiku/Sonnet/Opus) based on complexity, with persistent knowledge system

plugins.name: claude-knowledge
plugins.description: Persistent project knowledge for Claude Code - captures patterns, quirks, and decisions that survive session boundaries
